attributes.action: Deport every Tory voter in favour of asylum seekers
attributes.background: Since they've got no compassion or understanding of what it's like to have such a bad life that they have to flee their country, how about we deport every Tory voter to Syria and let the so called "illegal immigrants" take their places in British society.

rejection.details:
General elections in the UK are conducted by secret ballot. It would therefore not be possible for the UK Government to identify and deport people who had voted for a particular party at the general election.

It is also not possible for British citizens to be deported.
